devdoc.details: Allow users to vote on a proposal for yes or no. The user has to pay a fee to vote and can only vote one time on a proposal.

clean().details: Clean the current vote state and creates a new proposal. This method is useful for developers to start a new proposal for testing purposes.

getVote(address).details: Returns the vote of the user for the current proposal.

vote(uint256).details: Performs a vote for the current proposal.

devdoc.title: Proposal
